name: Cardboard-VR-Gampleay
description:
Introduction:

This is a simple VR game that lets players have a first VR experience in a simple and fun way. This game consists on feeding animals coming at us when pizza we shot at them. With this game you can have fun a couple of minutes while you familiarize with the VR environment

Instructions:

  • Aim the food with the VR cursor
  • Feed all the animals you can!
  • Move around to discover the environment

Development:

This game was developed with Unity and Google Cardboard VR API for Unity following this tutorial and using Google cardboard documentation

Objectives:

The main objective of this game is to provide a fun and simple VR experience to new users, let them interact and play a little.

The game objective is to feed animals shoting at them organic pizza. 

Conclusions:

This game was fun to program, specially doing the VR implementation. As someone new in the VR world I experienced some dizziness while playing VR videogames, so with this game, appart from getting the skills for Unity and VR development, I hope that users can have a fun and relaxing experience with VR.

Credits:

Ismael Ivan Lopez Murillo - Developer

Stephan Sokolow - Music, available at https://sirental.itch.io/farming-game-music
